That's a great idea! Having a live artist demonstration or painting session can definitely add an extra layer of excitement and entertainment to the event. It can also provide attendees with a unique experience, allowing them to see the artistic process up close and personal. This could also encourage more bidding, as attendees might be inspired to take home a piece of artwork created live during the event.

Additionally, you could consider offering a "buy-it-now" option for the live painting, where attendees can purchase the artwork immediately after it's completed. This can create a sense of urgency and exclusivity, as attendees will know they're getting a one-of-a-kind piece created specifically for the event.

It might also be a good idea to have a Q&A session or a meet-and-greet with the artists during the event, so attendees can learn more about their inspiration, creative process, and background.
